channel.title: My Router Is Super-Hard to Port-Forward (Rewards For Help)
channel.description:
Here's a copy of the default guide
http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Linksys/WRT54G/default.htm
You will become auto admin on my server if I have a no-ip, non-hamachi server.
Post here for help, my MSN messenger is thekeepa@hotmail.com, I would prefer a LIVE conversation.

item.title: My Router Is Super-Hard to Port-Forward (Rewards For Help)

Dude i could host for you or just do this just get a tut on how to portforward and then before u check the little box on the no-ip thing next to ur no-ip address run ur server first then check it in.
